rooms.description: A minimalistic entrance space designed for efficient movement with storage for coats and shoes.
An open-plan living area that integrates the kitchen, dining space, and social zone. Vastu principles are adhered to with east-facing windows for natural light.
A dedicated home office space located adjacent to the living area, ensuring minimal distractions while maintaining a separate work environment.
Compact yet functional bathroom with efficient layout for water usage and storage.

openings.description: A modern minimalistic door aligned with Vastu principles.
Large windows for natural light, ensuring proper ventilation and positive energy flow.

rooms.description: An expansive open terrace space designed for relaxation, social gatherings, and enjoying panoramic city views. Vastu guidelines are followed by placing water features or reflective objects in the north-west.
